data.title: Arizona Christian University
data.meta_description: Online or In Person Start Your Journey in Elementary or Secondary Education! Emerge As A Well-Rounded Educator. Inspire & Lead The Next Generation! Call (602) 386-4101 What scholarships do you qualify for? Call ACU now or fill out the form below to get started! Choose Your Education Program & Get More Info "*" indicates required
data.meta_site_name: Arizona Christian University - Transforming Culture With Truth
data.text:
A Gateway to Your Future

Joining us means more than just pursuing a degree. It’s your entry into a world of educational opportunities, where you can leave a lasting impact through your dedication and teaching expertise. Our campus is more than a place for academic study; it’s a nurturing community that promotes personal growth and excellence within a Christian ethos.

Education Degrees Available:

• Bachelor of Science in Elementary Education

• Bachelor of Science in Secondary Education

• Master of Arts in Education – Concentration in Instructional Leadership

• Master of Arts in Education – Concentration in Teaching and Learning

Commitment to Your Success

At Arizona Christian University, we understand the unique call to uplift and lead through education—anchored in Christian faith and values. Our commitment is to you, guiding every step towards becoming a beacon of wisdom and integrity in the classroom. With individualized attention through low student-to-faculty ratios, we’re here to support your mission.

Hands-on Experience: Gain invaluable teaching experience, integrating a Biblical worldview in practical settings.

Supportive Environment: From day one, join a nurturing faith-based community that values spiritual and academic growth. Together with our faculty and your peers, find strength and inspiration in shared values and goals.

Flexible Learning: Choose between vibrant campus life or the convenience of online learning, each path designed to fit your life and support your success as an educational leader with a Christ-centered approach.

Welcome to your spiritual and educational home, where your aspirations to make a difference find their grounding in Christian principles and dedicated support.
